review: Shiv Ganga Dham Ashram is where we held Bhagwath Saptah for 7 days with 80 people together. Their Manager, Staff were supportive. Rooms were AC and clean and neat. There is a beatifull temple too in the Ashram. The surrounding and location of the Ashram is also peaceful.  One visiting Haridwar, Rishikesh should must stay here for budget friendly and great spiritual accommodation.
name: Meera Joshi
